name: SEPA (Naej Doree)
description:
Super Electronical Payment Account

- a shmup with CanardPC and Bolloré -

This game was made in 48hours for the contest "Make Something Horrible" of CanardPC.

This is a reupload of the original game in a browser playable format, you can find the original here : https://naejdoreeklmp200.itch.io/sepa

"Wonderful 20/20" Gamekkkull

"A piece of art" JVC

Bolloré Approved Game

Main programmer : Naej Doree

Level designer : Naej Doree

Artworks : klmp200

Sound design : klmp200 & Donald Trump

[shmup/simulation]
